item.description:
🚀 Orbit Release 0.9.9.1

April 15, 2025

This update brings major performance improvements, new integrations, and important enhancements based on your feedback!

✨ New Features & Enhancements

💬 iMessage Integration 📣 Feedback

  • Added support for iMessage metadata integration
  • Note: Only metadata is accessed—your message content remains private

💼 Enhanced LinkedIn Integration 📣 Feedback

  • LinkedIn enrichment now supports education data, including degrees, institutions, and graduation years
  • Added support for skills and certifications from LinkedIn profiles

🔍 Smarter Search & Answers 📣 Feedback

  • Made search capabilities more intelligent with query expansion
  • Enhanced ability to answer general questions about your network

💾 Data Protection 📣 Feedback

  • Added automatic backup creation during your first sync during onboarding

🙏🏼 Improved Onboarding Experience 📣 Feedback

  • Added clear permissions requests during the onboarding flow
  • Updated onboarding to better explain the initial data sync process

⛑️ Better Support & Diagnostics 📣 Feedback

  • Added ability to send diagnostics when encountering issues
  • Implemented direct connection to founders for faster resolution of problems

💁🏻‍♀️ User Experience Improvements 📣 Feedback

  • Added helpful explanatory text for usage in Settings and Packs sections
  • Implemented tips for updates and other features

🚀 Performance Improvements

  • ⚡️ Bulk Updates: Dramatically improved speed of bulk contact updates 📣 Feedback
  • 💪 Large Address Books: Strengthened contact fetching for larger address books 📣 Feedback

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • Fixed issues with organization information retrieval
  • Resolved package update problems
  • Fixed user data not updating properly after data sync
  • Addressed bug where some organizations were missing name matching entries

🚀 Release 0.9.8.9 - March 21, 2025

🔔 New Features

  • 🔔 Added support for daily feed notifications! 📨
  • 👤 Added familiarity to contact profiles and profile cards 📨
  • 💬 Feed links now ask assistant to write messages & emails 📨

👑 Enhancements

  • 💯 Updated models for better responses
  • 🙋‍♂️ Fixed Agent tone and removed concise paragraph formatting
  • 🔍 Made typeahead scrollable with more results 📨
  • 👍 Fixed residual LinkedIn enrichment 📨
  • 🎁 Tweaked prompt for celebrations in feed
  • 🧼 Cleaned up settings UI

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • 🔍 Made answer generation more resilient to failures 📨
  • 📦 Fixed issue where latest version of packs is not being downloaded
  • 🔧 Updated pydantic class to support edge conditions 📨
  • 📱 Fixed regression for updates 📨
  • 📱 Fixed regression where key is missing but updates are made 📨
  • 📝 Fixed UI issue with user input text 📨
  • 📄 New line characters are now preserved & don't trigger submissions
  • ⚙️ Fixed crash for settings window
  • 🚀 Fixed bug where onboarding actions were called even after being completed
  • 🔔 Fixed notifications
  • ⚠️ Fixed various warnings in the codebase

📄 Documentation

  • ✅ Created a privacy page
  • ✅ Created a Terms of Service page

🔧 Technical Improvements

  • 👨‍💻 Added support for environment for observability
  • 📱 Updated GitHub action to use the latest labeller
  • ✂️ Removed old code
  • 🔧 Fixed check in context message

📨 Items implemented based on user feedback

We love hearing from you! Have feedback or feature suggestions? Email us at hello@askorbit.co

As always, we appreciate your feedback as we continue to evolve the Orbit platform!

✨ Orbit Release 0.9.8.8 🚀 - March 18, 2025 ✨

🎯 Feed Customization & Settings 📱

🌈 Personalized Activity Feed

  • 🔮 Create your perfect information feed with our new customization settings
  • 🎚️ Control what appears in your upcoming feed with easy toggles
  • 🔄 Feed automatically updates after contact sync to show the latest information

⚙️ Enhanced Settings

  • 🎛️ Configure your experience with our new comprehensive settings panel
  • 👤 Customize your agent persona to match your personal style
  • 🎯 Tailor feed preferences to focus on what matters most to you

📱 Improved App Experience

  • ⏰ Automatic app update checks every 3 hours to keep you on the latest version
  • ⚡ Refreshed loading window for a smoother startup experience
  • 🔍 Fixed minor UI bugs for a more polished interface

🛠️ Bug Fixes & Improvements 🛠️

  • ↩️ Fixed issues with undo functionality for more reliable editing
  • 📊 Improved enrichment logs for better tracking
  • 🤖 Resolved issue where agent persona updates weren't being applied
  • 🧩 Fixed field pack structure to properly add new fields
  • 📋 Added missing columns to field packs for complete data representation
  • 📝 Corrected copy functionality to ensure data integrity

🔧 Behind the Scenes 🔧

  • 🧹 Significant code cleanup for better performance
  • 🔄 Enhanced synchronization for more reliable data updates
  • ⚡ Technical optimizations to improve overall app responsiveness

✨ Coming Soon: Advanced organization filtering and more field packs tailored to your workflow! ✨

💬 Feedback

We're constantly improving Orbit based on your feedback. Please share your thoughts and suggestions through the app or by reaching out to our support team at hello@askorbit.com.
